game.name: Another Game About Automation
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Another Game About Automation is a casual factory-building where you have to generate numbers and combine them with mathematical operations. Upgrade and unlock new mathematical operations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Another Game About Automation is a casual factory-building where you have to generate numbers and combine them with mathematical operations. Upgrade and unlock new mathematical operations.
